verses.verse: Now the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> had a very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H6099><s%> multitude <S%H7227><s%> of cattle <S%H4735><s%>: and when they saw <S%H7200><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Jazer <S%H3270><s%>, and the land <S%H776><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%>, that <S%H4725><s%>, behold, the place was a place <S%H4725><s%> for cattle <S%H4735><s%>;

the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and spake <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, and to Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>, and unto the princes <S%H5387><s%> of the congregation <S%H5712><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Ataroth <S%H5852><s%>, and Dibon <S%H1769><s%>, and Jazer <S%H3270><s%>, and Nimrah <S%H5247><s%>, and Heshbon <S%H2809><s%>, and Elealeh <S%H500><s%>, and Sebam <S%H7643><s%>, and Nebo <S%H5015><s%>, and Beon <S%H1194><s%>,

the land <S%H776><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> smote <S%H5221><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, is a land <S%H776><s%> for cattle <S%H4735><s%>; and thy servants <S%H5650><s%> have cattle <S%H4735><s%>.

And they said <S%H559><s%>, If we have found <S%H4672><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in thy sight <S%H5869><s%>, let this land <S%H776><s%> be given <S%H5414><s%> unto thy servants <S%H5650><s%> for a possession <S%H272><s%>; bring us not over <S%H5674><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%>, and to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%>, Shall your brethren <S%H251><s%> go <S%H935><s%> to the war <S%H4421><s%>, and shall ye sit here <S%H3427><s%>?

And wherefore discourage ye <S%H5106><s%> the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> from going over <S%H5674><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath given them <S%H5414><s%>?
Thus did <S%H6213><s%> your fathers <S%H1><s%>, when I sent <S%H7971><s%> them from Kadesh-barnea <S%H6947><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>.

For when they went up <S%H5927><s%> unto the valley <S%H5158><s%> of Eshcol <S%H812><s%>, and saw <S%H7200><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>, they discouraged <S%H5106><s%> the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, that they should not go <S%H935><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> had given them <S%H5414><s%>.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>'s anger <S%H639><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> in that day <S%H3117><s%>, and he sware <S%H7650><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Surely <S%H518><s%> none of the men <S%H582><s%> that came up <S%H5927><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>, shall see <S%H7200><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> which I sware <S%H7650><s%> unto Abraham <S%H85><s%>, unto Isaac <S%H3327><s%>, and unto Jacob <S%H3290><s%>; because they have not wholly <S%H4390><s%> followed me <S%H310><s%>:

save Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh <S%H3312><s%> the Kenizzite <S%H7074><s%>, and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%>; because they have wholly <S%H4390><s%> followed <S%H310><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>'s anger <S%H639><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> against Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and he made them wander <S%H5128><s%> to and fro in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, until all the generation <S%H1755><s%>, that had done <S%H6213><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, was consumed <S%H8552><s%>.

And <S%H6965><s%>, behold, ye are risen up in your fathers <S%H1><s%>' stead <S%H8635><s%>, an increase of sinful <S%H2400><s%> men <S%H582><s%>, to augment <S%H5595><s%> yet the fierce <S%H2740><s%> anger <S%H639><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> toward Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

For if ye turn away <S%H7725><s%> from after <S%H310><s%> him <S%H3254><s%>, he will yet again leave <S%H3240><s%> them in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>; and ye will destroy <S%H7843><s%> all this people <S%H5971><s%>.

And they came near <S%H5066><s%> unto him <S%H559><s%>, and said, We will build <S%H1129><s%> sheepfolds <S%H1448><s%> here for our cattle <S%H4735><s%>, and cities <S%H5892><s%> for our little ones <S%H2945><s%>:

but we ourselves <S%H587><s%> will be ready <S%H2363><s%> armed <S%H2502><s%> to go before <S%H6440><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, until we have brought <S%H935><s%> them unto their place <S%H4725><s%>: and our little ones <S%H2945><s%> shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the fortified <S%H4013><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>.

We will not return <S%H7725><s%> unto our houses <S%H1004><s%>, until the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> have inherited <S%H5157><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his inheritance <S%H5159><s%>.

For we will not inherit <S%H5157><s%> with them on the other side <S%H5676><s%> of the Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, and forward <S%H1973><s%>; because our inheritance <S%H5159><s%> is fallen <S%H935><s%> to us on this side <S%H5676><s%> of the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> eastward <S%H4217><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H6213><s%>, If ye will do this thing <S%H1697><s%>, if ye will arm <S%H2502><s%> yourselves to go before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> to the war <S%H4421><s%>,

and every armed <S%H2502><s%> man of you will pass <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, until he hath driven out <S%H3423><s%> his enemies <S%H341><s%> from before him <S%H6440><s%>,

and the land <S%H776><s%> is subdued <S%H3533><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; then afterward <S%H310><s%> ye shall return <S%H7725><s%>, and be guiltless <S%H5355><s%> towards Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and towards Israel <S%H3478><s%>; and this land <S%H776><s%> shall be unto you for a possession <S%H272><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
But if ye will not do so <S%H6213><s%>, behold <S%H2398><s%>, ye have sinned against Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; and be sure <S%H3045><s%> your sin <S%H2403><s%> will find you out <S%H4672><s%>.

Build <S%H1129><s%> you cities <S%H5892><s%> for your little ones <S%H2945><s%>, and folds <S%H1448><s%> for your sheep <S%H6792><s%>; and do <S%H6213><s%> that which hath proceeded <S%H3318><s%> out of your mouth <S%H6310><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> spake <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Thy servants <S%H5650><s%> will do <S%H6213><s%> as my lord <S%H113><s%> commandeth <S%H6680><s%>.
Our little ones <S%H2945><s%>, our wives <S%H802><s%>, our flocks <S%H4735><s%>, and all our cattle <S%H929><s%>, shall be there in the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%>;

but thy servants <S%H5650><s%> will pass over <S%H5674><s%>, every man that is armed <S%H2502><s%> for war <S%H6635><s%>, before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> to battle <S%H4421><s%>, as my lord <S%H3068><s%> saith <S%H1696><s%>.

So Moses <S%H4872><s%> gave charge <S%H6680><s%> concerning them to Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>, and to Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%>, and to the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses of the tribes <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H1121><s%>, If the children of Gad <S%H1410><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> will pass with you over <S%H5674><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, every man that is armed <S%H2502><s%> to battle <S%H4421><s%>, before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and the land <S%H776><s%> shall be subdued <S%H3533><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you <S%H5414><s%>; then ye shall give them the land <S%H776><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%> for a possession <S%H272><s%>:
but if they will not pass over <S%H5674><s%> with you armed <S%H2502><s%>, they shall have possessions <S%H270><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> you in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, As Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath said <S%H1696><s%> unto thy servants <S%H5650><s%>, so will we do <S%H6213><s%>.

We will <S%H5168><s%> pass over <S%H5674><s%> armed <S%H2502><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>, and the possession <S%H272><s%> of our inheritance <S%H5159><s%> shall remain with us beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> unto them <S%H1121><s%>, even to the children of Gad <S%H1410><s%>, and to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%>, and unto the half <S%H2677><s%> - tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, the kingdom <S%H4467><s%> of Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, and the kingdom <S%H4467><s%> of Og <S%H5747><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan <S%H1316><s%>, the land <S%H776><s%>, according to the cities <S%H5892><s%> thereof with their borders <S%H1367><s%>, even the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>.
And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> Dibon <S%H1769><s%>, and Ataroth <S%H5852><s%>, and Aroer <S%H6177><s%>,
and Atrothshophan <S%H5855><s%>, and Jazer <S%H3270><s%>, and Jogbehah <S%H3011><s%>,
and Beth-nimrah <S%H1039><s%>, and Beth-haran <S%H1028><s%>: fortified <S%H4013><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%>, and folds <S%H1448><s%> for sheep <S%H6629><s%>.
And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> Heshbon <S%H2809><s%>, and Elealeh <S%H500><s%>, and Kiriathaim <S%H7156><s%>,

and Nebo <S%H5015><s%>, and Baal-meon <S%H1186><s%>, (their names <S%H8034><s%> being changed <S%H4142><s%>,) and Sibmah <S%H7643><s%>: and they gave <S%H7121><s%> other names <S%H8034><s%> unto the cities <S%H5892><s%> which they builded <S%H1129><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Machir <S%H4353><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> to Gilead <S%H1568><s%>, and took <S%H3920><s%> it <S%H3423><s%>, and dispossessed the Amorites that were therein <S%H567><s%>.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> Gilead <S%H1568><s%> unto Machir <S%H4353><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>; and he dwelt therein <S%H3427><s%>.

And Jair <S%H2971><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> and took <S%H3920><s%> the towns <S%H2333><s%> thereof <S%H7121><s%>, and called them Havvoth-jair <S%H2334><s%>.

And Nobah <S%H5025><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> and took <S%H3920><s%> Kenath <S%H7079><s%>, and the villages <S%H1323><s%> thereof <S%H7121><s%>, and called it Nobah <S%H5025><s%>, after his own name <S%H8034><s%>.
